speech.p: Chuaigh an Cathaoirleach i gceannas ar 10:30
Sitting suspended at 11.35 a.m. and resumed at 11.45 a.m.
Amendments Nos. 1 to 3, inclusive, not moved.
Tellers: Tá, Senators Sean D. Barrett and John Crown; Níl, Senators Paul Coghlan and Aideen Hayden.
Progress reported; Committee to sit again.

speech.p: Tellers: Tá, Senators Sean D. Barrett and John Crown; Níl, Senators Paul Coghlan and Aideen Hayden.
Progress reported; Committee to sit again.

Question proposed: "That section 5 stand part of the Bill."

publicwhip.major-heading: Equal Status (Amendment) Bill 2012: Motion for Earlier Signature

speech.p: Sitting suspended at 2.55 p.m. and resumed at 3.30 p.m.
Notice taken that 12 Members were not present; House counted and 12 Members being present,
Amendments Nos. 2 to 4, inclusive, not moved
Question proposed: "That section 1 stand part of the Bill."
Question proposed: "That section 3 stand part of the Bill."
Question put and agreed to. SECTION 4 Question proposed: "That section 4 stand part of the Bill".
Question proposed: "That section 5 stand part of the Bill."
We are dealing with the respite care grant.
Question, “That Report Stage be taken tomorrow,” put and declared carried.
Report Stage ordered for Thursday, 20 December 2012.

publicwhip.major-heading: Finance (Local Property Tax) Bill 2012: Second Stage

speech.p: Question proposed: "That the Bill be now read a Second Time."
The Seanad divided by electronic means.
Tellers: Tá, Senators Paul Coghlan and Aideen Hayden; Níl, Senators Ned O'Sullivan and Diarmuid Wilson.
Question, “That Report Stage be taken tomorrow,” put and declared carried.
Report Stage ordered for Thursday, 20 December 2012.

publicwhip.major-heading: Finance (Local Property Tax) Bill 2012: Second Stage

speech.p: Question proposed: "That the Bill be now read a Second Time."
Tellers: Tá, Senators Paul Coghlan and Aideen Hayden; Níl, Senators Trevor Ó Clochartaigh and Diarmuid Wilson..
Question put: "That Committee Stage be taken tomorrow."
Tellers: Tá, Senators Paul Coghlan and Aideen Hayden; Níl, Senators David Cullinane and Trevor Ó Clochartaigh.
The Seanad adjourned at 10.05 p.m. until 10.30 a.m. on Thursday, 20 December 2012.
